meanings.definition: Gussies (verb): to dress up or make fancy
meanings.sent1: She gussies up for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He always gussies himself up before going out.
meanings.sent3: The cat gussies up in a tiny bow tie for the party.
meanings.sent4: The garden gussies up with colorful flowers in spring.
meanings.sent5: The room gussies up with twinkling lights for the celebration.

meanings.definition: Gussies (noun): fancy or stylish clothing or accessories
meanings.sent1: She loves to wear her gussies to events.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of gussies for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The dog proudly parades in his gussies around the park.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of gussies sparkles like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show displayed the latest gussies in town.
